00015 Clip::Clip (const std::vector<unsigned char> &image, const unsigned int &imageWidth, const unsigned int &x, const unsigned int &y, const unsigned int &height, const unsigned int &width)
00016     : x_(x), y_(y), width_(width), height_(height)
00017 {
00018     // Compute the number of pixels within the clip
00019     nPixels_ = width_ * height_;
00020     
00021     // Allocate space for the clip
00022     pixels_.reserve(nPixels_);
00023     
00024     // Copy the contents of the frame within the source image to the clip
00025     for ( unsigned int i = x; i < (x + height_); ++i )
00026     {
00027         std::vector<unsigned char>::const_iterator rowIterator = image.begin();
00028         advance (rowIterator, (i * imageWidth) + y);
00029         
00030         for ( unsigned int j = 0; j < width_; ++j )
00031         {
00032             pixels_.push_back(*rowIterator);
00033             advance (rowIterator, 1);
00034         }
00035     }
00036 };
00037 
00038 
00043 void Clip::setPixelGrayLevel (const unsigned int &x, const unsigned int &y, const unsigned char &grayLevel)
00044 {
00045     unsigned int index = (x * width_) + y;
00046     
00047     if ( index >= pixels_.size() )
00048         throw NessieException ("Clip::setPixelGrayLevel() : The coordinates are outside the clip");
00049 
00050     pixels_[index] = grayLevel;
00051 };
00052 
00053 
00057 const unsigned char &Clip::getPixelGrayLevel (const unsigned int &x, const unsigned int &y) const
00058 {
00059     unsigned int index = (x * width_) + y;
00060     
00061     if ( index >= pixels_.size() )
00062         throw NessieException ("Clip::getPixelGrayLevel() : The coordinates are outside the clip");
00063         
00064     return pixels_[index];
00065 };
